Features.title: Regular Check Ins
Features.text: Schedule checks in at your preferred frequency.

Features.title: Push Notifications
Features.text: Automatically be notified when it is time to check in.

Features.title: History
Features.text: A complete history of your past check ins.

Features.title: Insights
Features.text: Analytics and insights into your history.
